channel.title: Help me i want start forums for scractch
channel.description: read topic there must be register and login and log out system and admin panel and mysql with php... NOTE: I dont need forums like phpbb, invision. vbulletin or smf... PLEASE SUGGEST

item.title: Help me i want start forums for scractch
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“N00b1, post:6, topic:137189”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=188758.msg1704872#msg1704872 date=1188173375]
and that doesnt mean just go

“Wheres source code?”

we will give advice but we wont do it for you.
[/quote]

a-men to that

[hr]
[hr]

[hr]
[hr]
any way why don’t you just get smf and mod the hell outa it; they have figured out most of the probs you’ll need to ever figure out[/quote]

What’s up with the quadruple hr? lol.

Anyway, yea, get SMF, mod it, whatever. It is probably a better bet than coding your own because you won’t have to worry about things like security holes and other problems that can arise from hurried or beginner code.

Read full topic
